Subclass/Dual Class Certificate Manager Trandon:
Once you reach a certain level of skill in your dual class, you skills can be certified. As a result, you will be able to learn some special skills which you can use in your main class and dual class. That means that even if you come back with a different occupation for the subclass, you cannot obtain another certification unless you first spend a *huge amount to cancel the first certification*. If you want to obtain a certification, *your current occupation has to be Dual Class, and you should be above level 85*. Now, do you wish to be certified for this Dual Class? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/certification/dualcertificatemore.htm|Listen to a detailed explanation about dual class certification.] [npc_%objectId%_subclass_DualCertList|Get certified.]
